name: Residential Quarter
description: A quiet neighborhood of homes and apartments; adventurers can find lodging, meet ordinary citizens, or investigate local mysteries.
atmosphere: The district has a comfortable, lived-in feel with the sounds of daily life drifting from open windows. The air carries the scent of home cooking, laundry drying in the sun, and the simple pleasures of domestic life. Children play in the streets while adults go about their daily routines, creating a sense of community and normalcy.
